attributes.action: Make University libraries accessible to students from other Universities
attributes.additional_details: I have spoken to many other students that find this an issue.
attributes.background: I think that all university students should be able to go to the library no matter what city they are in. I go to University nearly an hour from where I live. When it is exam period it becomes very difficult for me as in order to go to an academic library I have to travel almost an hour.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
